alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 16 at 2:51AM EST until February 18 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 or more inches and ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain on Thursday will change to a wintry mix on Thursday evening, before changing to all snow by late Thursday evening. A period of moderate to heavy snow or mixed precipitation is possible between 9 PM and 4 AM Thursday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
